'''Muhai''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Mataru of the Kahanga tribe, Muhai has recently passed away in her home. A proud, stubborn woman, her spirit instead clinged to life, demanding that the proper rites be executed before she passes to the wheel. Of course, the situation is a bit more complicated: Muhai broke with the wahua and for that was sentenced to banishment from collective memory. Her crime? As a member of the Auweki tribe, who were fierce enemies of the Wapua, she purposefully led the latter's hunting party when they sought her counsel as navigator. As all Huana who are part of the Queen's domain are considered a single tribe, the Kahanga, this was a violation of the most basic tenets of their culture and law, leading to Muhai's banishment.

## =Quests

=
* [Her Last Request](/herLastRequest/): She asks that you cremate her body at the Sacred Stair, dedicating it to Magran in death.
